quotes.quote: It is not the monsters we should be afraid of; it is the people that don't recognize the same monsters inside of themself.
The best secrets are the most twisted
Glory is reserved for the twisted minds.
They were the screams of riders torn apart by the twisted reflections of their own inner selves.
Death is funny, when you think about it. Everybody does it, but nobody knows how, exactly how.
People are more twisted than people think.
Fate has a twisted sense of humor.
Between thought and spoken word is a gap where intention can enter, the symbol be twisted aside, and the lie come to be.
No matter how damaged we were by our lives, we are whole when we are together
Without pride, man becomes a parasite â€“ and there are already too many parasites.
Too often the past has been twisted to fit the visions and agendas of the present.
Don't be lookin up at no sky for help. Look down here, at us twisted dreamers.
Surely the vogue of those twisted and contorted human figures must be as short as it is artificial.
Conditioning obstructs our view of reality. We do not see IT in its suchness because of our indoctrination, crooked and twisted.
Ego and pride is a two headed twist.
We're all kind of weird and twisted and drowning
